Uses of Package
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes

Packages that use fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
Classes in this package are in charge of passing information based on user-input gathered from the view to the model, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes
Contains components that are common to plural scenes of the GUI View.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game
Contains the components that are specific to the ingame scene.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.mainmenu
The GUI View's Main Menu scene, from which the user can access different settings or launch the game.
  • Classes in fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes used by fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
    Class
    Description
    ChoiceButton
    Button of a ChoicesPanel, used to collect user-input in order to choose an entry within a Menu.

    Class
    Description
    ChoiceButton
    Button of a ChoicesPanel, used to collect user-input in order to choose an entry within a Menu.
    GridBagCell
    A custom graphical component used to make non-homogeneous grids out of plural components.

    Class
    Description
    ChoicesPanel
    This class defines a visual representation for Menus on the GUI View.
    GridBagCell
    A custom graphical component used to make non-homogeneous grids out of plural components.

    An extension of JPanel managed by a GridBagLayout.
